source: Senate GOP vows big changes for ObamaCare bill. Senate Republicans plan to dramatically overhaul the House ObamaCare repeal bill that passed Thursday and are warning the process could take weeks.

How Obamacare Repeal Could Run Aground in the Senate. Republicans in the upper chamber might set aside the House-passed bill and write their own legislation instead. Their narrow majority leaves them almost no room for division.

AHCA: Republican health care bill headed for overhaul in Senate. While President Trump took a victory lap with House Republicans after their health care bill passed its first big test Thursday, the hard work is just beginning for the majority party whose mission these past seven years has been ObamaCare’s demise.
target: Senate Vows AHCA Overhaul. While President Trump took a victory lap with House Republicans after their health care bill passed its first big test Thursday, the hard work is just beginning as AHCA heads to the Senate.
